reuters.title: MOODY'S MAY DOWNGRADE GOTABANKEN AND UNIT, AFFECTS 2.2 BILLION CROWNS OF DEBT
reuters.body: Creditanstalt-Bankverein <CABV.VI>, the largest commercial bank in Austria, has arranged a 100 mln stg certificate of deposit program, banking sources said. The dealers for the program will be S.G. Warburg and Co Ltd and County NatWest Capital Markets Ltd. REUTER 
